scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd ./build && git init . && git add -A && git commit -m "Deploy `date`" && git push 'ssh://git@github.com/srcreigh/srcreigh.github.io.git' master --force && rm -rf .git && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/ && git clone https://github.com/srcreigh/metalsmith-ignore.git && cd metalsmith-ignore && npm install && rm -rf .git && cd ../..
